welcome_message_body: Welcome to Barueri, Brazil! Known for its vibrant cultural scene and stunning natural beauty, we hope you enjoy exploring the charm of our city and all it has to offer. Have a wonderful time discovering Barueri!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, exclusively for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
